noun.description: Chiefly Botany. The condition or process of being bent, folded, or turned back; an instance of this.
Electronics. The use or action of a reflex circuit. Now rare.

adjective.description: Botany. Of a part of a plant: bent or curved back; recurved. Of a plant: having parts (especially of the flower) that bend or curve back.

origin: Late 16th century (in an earlier sense). From reflex + -ing<br>early 17th century (in an earlier sense). From reflex + -ing.
